Uses of Package
com.continuuity.loom.store

Packages that use com.continuuity.loom.store
com.continuuity.loom.http Http handlers implementing REST endpoints. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs. 
com.continuuity.loom.store Persistent stores for admin definable entities, clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes. 
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.store used by com.continuuity.loom.http
ClusterStore
          Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
EntityStore
          EntityStore for adding, modifying, retrieving, and deleting admin definable entities.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.store used by com.continuuity.loom.scheduler

          Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.store used by com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task
ClusterStore
          Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.store used by com.continuuity.loom.store
BaseClusterStore
          Store that uses Zookeeper for creating new unique ids.
BaseEntityStore
          Abstract EntityStore that represents entities as json.
BaseEntityStore.EntityType
          Types of entities.
ClusterStore
          Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
